_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Discord Pterodactyl Bot
author: arvati@hotmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Pterodactyl Discord Bot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apt-get update && apt-get -y install git

mkdir -p /mnt/server
rm -rf /mnt/server/* /mnt/server/.[a-zA-Z0-9]*
cd /mnt/server

echo "Pulling the Pterodactyl Discord Bot from github"

git clone --single-branch --branch master https://github.com/arvati/Pterodactyl-Discord-Bot.git .

echo "Installing dependencies!"

yarn install --production

echo "Compiling/Building"

yarn build

echo "Install complete. If you watched this. Congrats."

variables.name: Discord Token
variables.description: Your discord api token. Available on https://discord.com/developers/applications/me

variables.name: Pterodactyl Token
variables.description: Your pterodactyl API token. It can be created in the Application API section of admin settings. Check all the boxes for both read and write.

variables.name: Pterodactyl URL
variables.description: Your pterodactyl host domain/IP. Must include http/https. Example: "https://panel.linux123123.cf"

variables.name: Pterodactyl Client Token
variables.description: Your pterodactyl client API token. It can be created in the admin ACCOUNT API section. It needs to be an admin account to have all the permissions to start and stop servers.
